items.title: 9 responsible animal encounters you can have with Intrepid
items.excerpt: This one’s for the animal lovers. Here’s a round-up of epic wildlife encounters you can feel good about.

items.title: On an Uncharted Expedition from Kazakhstan to Mongolia, this traveller had no itinerary and no regrets
items.excerpt: Kim was no stranger to adventure when she booked an Uncharted Expedition through Central Asia back in 2019, but not knowing where she’d be going each day gave her the kind of raw, authentic travel moments she’d always craved.

items.title: 11 strangers, 10 days, 1 boat: my life-changing sailing trip in Greece
items.excerpt: This article was originally published in June 2019.

items.title: Forget AI: This Tokyo robot cafe is all about human connection
items.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is being touted as the solution to many of humanity’s problems. But in Japan, an innovative cafe is harnessing the power of robotic technology to tackle loneliness and celebrate inclusivity – not with AI, but real human-to-human connections.

items.title: Travelling with ADHD? Try a group trip
items.excerpt: Morwenna is an experienced traveller who enjoys independent trips alongside plenty of small group adventures. But, as she realised after her diagnosis, one style of travel in particular is the most beneficial for her ADHD brain.
